# Tender Announcement: EA372-210001-G RMSO- Temporary Help Services

**Title:** EA372-210001-G RMSO- Temporary Help Services
**Reference Number:** WS3972930449-Doc4544339332
**Solicitation Number:** WS3972930449
**Publication Date:** 2024-04-18
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-08T14:00:00

**Procurement Overview**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking temporary help services for federal government departments and agencies across Canada. The successful bidder will be awarded a multi-year standing offer to provide workforce solutions on an as-and-when basis for a period of six months, with an option for an additional one-year extension.

**Job Requirements and Locations**
Successful bidder(s) will provide temporary help services across various public sector departments and agencies in the following regions:

* Nova Scotia
* Prince Edward Island
* New Brunswick
* Newfoundland and Labrador

**Competition Method**
The competition method is open bidding.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender aligns with the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Eligibility**
To be eligible to participate in this opportunity, bidders must:

* Have a minimum level of experience providing temporary help services to the federal government
* Meet the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work

**Special Requirements**
This procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business.

**Contact Information**
For inquiries or questions regarding this opportunity, please contact:

Genevieve Petten

genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
